intro: Sedum venustum, commonly known as the showy sedum, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Crassulaceae and is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and vibrant, star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in prairies, open woodlands, and along roadsides. Sedum venustum is known for its resilience and ability to withstand drought conditions.
